section.p:
With apparent reluctance the golem admits you to the fortress, where you are allowed to stuff your pockets with gold and precious gems worth 1000-6000 Shards ( and multiply by 1000). [Collect the money by repeatedly clicking
here until the text becomes disabled --Ed]
With your new-found wealth dripping from both hands, you hasten back to where your men are waiting and tell them to make ready to put to sea. .
